title: Boost for Pogačar and Roglič as Injured Matej Mohorič Likely to Compete in World Road Race Championships after All
content:
The gravel world champion was injured during Sea Otter Europe Girona course reconnaissance, raising concerns about worlds.

Read the full article at Boost for Pogačar and Roglič as Injured Matej Mohorič Likely to Compete in World Road Race Championships after All on Velo.
author: sstokes
